description: Numbers n such that (20^n+1)/21 is a prime.
comments: (20^1163+1)/21, a 1512-digit number, has been certified prime with Primo. - _Rick L. Shepherd_, May 17 2002
links: H. Dubner and T. Granlund, Primes of the Form (b^n+1)/(b+1), J. Integer Sequences, 3 (2000), #P00.2.7.
prog: (PARI) forprime(n=3,10^7, if( ispseudoprime((20^n+1)/21), print1(n,", "))); \\ _Joerg Arndt_, May 26 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 15 2000
extensions: a(10), corresponding to a probable prime, from _Paul Bourdelais_, Dec 08 2014
